briefdescription.para: Performs mesh adaptation (refinement/coarsening) for the model.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type
XParam
Model parameters
XForcing
Forcing data
XModel
Model structure
Iteratively refines or coarsens the mesh based on adaptation criteria, updating block info and variables.

briefdescription.para: Performs initial mesh adaptation and reruns initial conditions.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, bool *&refine, bool *&coarsen)
memberdef.name: refinesanitycheck

memberdef.argsstring: (int neighbourib, int levelib, int levelneighbour, bool *&refine, bool *&coarsen)
memberdef.name: checkneighbourrefine

briefdescription.para: Checks the consistency and sanity of the block uniform quadtree mesh.

simplesect.para: True if mesh is sane, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (int ib, int levelib, int neighbourib, int levelneighbour)
memberdef.name: checklevel

briefdescription.para: Applies adaptation (refinement/coarsening) to the mesh and updates variables.
Calculates the number of available blocks for refinement.

simplesect.para: Number of available blocks for refinement.

briefdescription.para: Adds new blocks to the mesh for adaptation.

parameterdescription.para: Number of new blocks to add

simplesect.para: New total number of blocks in memory.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > &XBlock, AdaptP &XAdapt, EvolvingP< T > XEvo, EvolvingP< T > &XEv)
memberdef.name: coarsen

briefdescription.para: Coarsens mesh blocks and updates conserved variables.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > &XBlock, AdaptP &XAdapt, EvolvingP< T > XEvo, EvolvingP< T > &XEv)
memberdef.name: refine

briefdescription.para: Refines mesh blocks and interpolates conserved variables.

inbodydescription.para: How did we miss that before

briefdescription.para: Cleans up and updates block lists after adaptation.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type
XParam
Model parameters
XBlock
Block data structure
XAdapt
Adaptation data structure
Updates block levels, reorders active block list, and finalizes adaptation.

memberdef.name: checkneighbourdistance

briefdescription.para: Checks if the distance between a block and its neighbor is consistent with their levels.

parameterdescription.para: True if neighbor is right/top, false if left/bottom

simplesect.para: True if distance is consistent, false otherwise.
